parameters.name: DName
parameters.description: If IncrementType is... Then set DName to... 1 Name of the pattern instance dimension to increment 2 "Spacing Increment"

parameters.name: PatternType
parameters.description: Type of pattern (see Remarks ): 2 = linear 4 = circular 256 = table-driven

parameters.name: Direction
parameters.description: Direction in which to apply the dimension or spacing increment. If PatternType is... Then set Direction to... 2 0 = direction 1 1 = direction 2 4 0 = direction 1

parameters.name: IncrementValue
parameters.description: Value with which to increment the pattern instance dimension or spacing

title: IFeatureManager.InsertVaryInstanceIncrement
signature:
System.Boolean InsertVaryInstanceIncrement( 
   System.String
DName
,
   System.Int32
PatternType
,
   System.Int32
IncrementType
,
   System.Int32
Direction
,

IncrementValue
)

parameters.name: DName
parameters.description: If IncrementType is... Then set DName to... 1 Name of the pattern instance dimension to increment 2 "Spacing Increment"

parameters.name: PatternType
parameters.description: Type of pattern (see Remarks ): 2 = linear 4 = circular 256 = table-driven

parameters.name: Direction
parameters.description: Direction in which to apply the dimension or spacing increment. If PatternType is... Then set Direction to... 2 0 = direction 1 1 = direction 2 4 0 = direction 1

parameters.name: IncrementValue
parameters.description: Value with which to increment the pattern instance dimension or spacing

returns: True if the increment is applied successfully, false if not
remarks:
To vary the spacings or dimensions of pattern instances:
Call this method multiple times to increment multiple dimensions or spacings of pattern instances.
Call
IFeatureManager::InsertVaryInstanceOverride
multiple times to override multiple dimensions or spacings of pattern instances.
If PatternType is...
Call IFeatureManager::CreateFeature(...)
2
LinearPatternFeatureData object
4
CircularPatternFeatureData object
256
DimPatternFeatureData object
